TopicTitle: Does the steam version of KSP require the steam client to run?

Articles.Content: As .21 is coming out any femtosecond now, I want to keep my .21 for posterity, so if I just copy my ksp folder from steam to another folder, will it run minus the steam client?
It does not require Steam to run.

Excellent. Thank you my Man.

Now then, oh drat. this should probably be in howto. Mods, move this.

Poof.

Anyway, yeah, that's the nice thing about KSP. Thought it is on Steam, the DRM part of it is disabled so you can toss it anywhere you like and still play.
I would be interested in knowing how much mod-breakage is expected with .21...
